lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to open a business & how grateful I was that I was able to borrow money from friends & family.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small cafe serving breakfast & lunch with my business partner. I work in the front serving customers & then take care of the accounting after work.

lenders.name: Annabelle
lenders.loan_because: my grandmother, pictured here, was very much in the same situation as many of those seeking loans on this site.  She came from a poor farming background, in Southern Illinois, USA, had to leave school early, lost her husband at an early age due to a stroke, but managed to inspire her four children to finish school.  She passed away a few years ago, so I would like to pay her contribution to our family forward and help others get a head start towards making their lives and their children's lives better.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: it creates sustainable value.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise companies on financial matters.

lenders.name: Zach
lenders.loan_because:
"It is more blessed to give than to receive."
Acts 20:35
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior at Villanova University double majoring in finance and accounting and minoring in entrepreneurship. I am going into forensic accounting after college.

lenders.name: Genevieve

lenders.name: HeBre

"I believe that to teach a man how to fish is better than just giving him fish" 

4 me Micro financing is a digital extension of that. CLEARLY Todays charities are not nurturing anything other than a sick dependence that is almost always organised & administered from the same framework of the oppressive bureaucracies of the developed world.

"CHARITY OUGHT NEVER BE ORGANISED"

Trespeso Music was my own personal
mission to assist in a communities development in an artistic musical & economic way. I am happy to help elsewhere when I can, Kiva seems to be a good platform to participate on an individual level.
lenders.occupational_info: 24/7 Grind forever trying to turn events and situations into positive out comes.

lenders.loan_because: My kids gave me a gift certificate for Mother's Day! They said it was a perfect gift for someone who taught them to always give to others and help those in need.

lenders.loan_because: Especially after spending a lot of time in Kenya, I have learned that one of the best ways to make an impact in the world is through more personal relationships.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a public school; kids ages 5-11; mostly 9 year olds. I also spend a lot of time serving with my church building a relationship with a community in northern Kenya.

lenders.name: Martha McGinnis
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I respect the courage of these borrowers and the challenges they face.  I am also deeply grateful for all the benefits, opportunities, and assistance I've received in my own life.  This is a wonderful way to pass some of that along to others.
lenders.occupational_info: People in business and organizations hold a lot of meetings, and spend a lot of time, money and energy doing it.  However, they often don't remember them very well afterward.  My job is to listen very carefully during a meeting, and to capture what's important.  So, while it's all happening, I am creating a wall-sized mural that's a colorful combination of words and images.  Later, people use the mural and smaller re-prints to remember, discuss, and share what happened.  The murals also go into slide shows, newsletters, and onto websites--the whole point is to make better use of the meeting!  My biggest role though, is to LISTEN...most people don't do that very well!

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I want to see more people make the shift to being business owners and do whatever I can to help.
lenders.occupational_info:

lenders.occupational_info: I work as a teacher language teacher (English, German, Swedish) in Waldorf school. Since 1995 in Seinäjoki, now in in Tampere. The work is challenging, interesting and rewarding. I try my best to give my pupils something they need. But mostly I think the pupils have taught me more than I them. I have been to many schools, but Waldorf school is my place. It sees people as a whole and I appreciate the values my collegues have.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I want to speed the increase of sustainability and quality of life around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I figure out the best way to put software together for people using both science and creativity.

lenders.name: Jing Feng
lenders.loan_because: i believe in  'service above self'. if we can spend 25bucks a week on stuff that we dont really need, i believe we can use it for a greater cause. most imptly, this is a direct way of helping those who really need help
lenders.occupational_info: still a student

lenders.name: Rolf
lenders.loan_because: In our word the money is unfortunately  not distributed fair and this is a good way to improve that.

lenders.name: Colin & Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: Because even though we don't have a lot of money, we have enough to help someone else improve their life.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people protect their ideas and their money!

lenders.name: Daisy
lenders.loan_because: I care and support Kiva's mission in helping others. "If I can give I will and if I can't, I'll try"
lenders.occupational_info: I'm blessed to work with a diverse group of intelligent people with whom I can learn from. I have the opportunity for a better future and would love to help others receive the same blessings in return.

lenders.name: Arthur & Janice
lenders.loan_because: because we like to help other people!!

lenders.name: nomie
lenders.occupation: other attributes but  a man who believes in love

lenders.name: Al 5

lenders.occupational_info: i very expert in repairing cycle work and now i want asmbles a new cycles

lenders.name: Teeraporn
lenders.loan_because: Life is too short to ignore others people problem.
lenders.occupational_info: My sales job is stressful... I am so relax to see I can help others.

lenders.name: Tobi und Eva
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our luck!!!

lenders.name: Gurlherleki
lenders.loan_because: We're privileged to be able to lend, and are inspired by the opportunities Kiva creates. Plus, it's a way for our family members, living in two cities, to share a project together.
lenders.occupational_info: Our family includes two mothers, a dentist, a personal chef, a university administrator, and a retired marketing manager.

lenders.name: Rocco COM 101
lenders.loan_because: This is a group donation from a public speaking class at Washtenaw Community College located in Ann Arbor, MI.
lenders.occupational_info: College Students.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It's amazing to help people in a small way so they can achieve their big dreams.

lenders.name: Susanne Cologne Germany
lenders.loan_because: Good idea.

lenders.name: Dara
lenders.loan_because: All people need anywhere is a little help. As Ghandi put it, You must be the change you want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Syracuse University in New York, studying international relations and magazine journalism.

lenders.name: Charles & Yiskah
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is the way to enable people to have more dignity and self-direction in their lives by gaining economic success.  It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Krissy
lenders.loan_because: Even though I live off of a modest income I feel like any bit I can give can make a difference in someone else's life. I have been very fortunate in many ways and always seem to have just enough of what I need. I hope to be inspirational to others to help in any small way they can. $1 means something different to all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a lot of families who have just experienced a huge loss. I love the fact I can give something back to them in such a time of need. I work to give them their last physical goodbye to their loved one. Oddly, it gives me a brighter outlook on life by dealing with death daily. Everyone should fall in love with life.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: free enterprise unlocks the doors to liberty, justice and progress.

lenders.name: zach
lenders.loan_because: i like to help people in need and because they need the money more than me.
lenders.occupational_info: it is very fun and exiting!!

lenders.name: never12die
lenders.loan_because: I think I can be helpful
lenders.occupational_info: Earn some while helping

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I have a lot to be thankful for.
lenders.occupational_info: I deal with manufacturing of clothing: making it all fit through measurements and paper patterns.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I love how micro-lending flattens the world and helps people escape poverty.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because:
It promotes independence and personal responsibility.  Also, it shows that we're not all the small minded ***holes that Bush presents us as.
I prefer to loan through gift certificates to friends.  I think it makes a unique gift and helps spread the word.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for P&G (Procter & Gamble) as an Account Executive and Customer Development Team Manager.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: The loans make a big difference to the recipients .

lenders.loan_because: Life is good, and our good fortune should be shared.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm involved in selling high tech equipment to broadcasters.

lenders.occupational_info: LONG HOURS BUT REWARDING

lenders.name: Su (without an e)

lenders.occupational_info: Work with school children with different disabilities be as successful as possible in school while having fun and feeling good about themselves.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who work for their families.

lenders.name: Andrea, Kelly, Kira, Dallas and Zack
Catherine
lenders.occupation: Teacher Assistant and Full Time Student
lenders.loan_because: I am taking a Geography course this summer and we watched a video on the impact of KIVA.  It really touhed me and although I do not have much money to my name, I knew I had more than others and wanted to do my part to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a teacher.  Currently I work at a middle school outside of Nashville, Tennessee while attending a local university.  I work with children with special needs in their classes.  It has helped me to realize how much I want to reach my goals and become a teacher and counselor.

lenders.name: Alicia & Ryan

Alicia:  I work for an as a drafter for an architectural firm that designs universities and research facilities.
Ryan:  I work for a tech company as a software designer.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: There are so many areas of lending that have been underserved.  Microfinance encourages entrepreneurial activity and lenders are provided a revolving door to monitor its impact.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: it helps people improve their lives and, in turn, improves mine.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I would like to think that if I were the one in need of a loan, there would be someone there to help me.
lenders.occupational_info: I have 2 jobs. I work in an office Monday - Friday in the payroll office of a large company, and in my spare time I am a writer. I write advertising, articles and newsletters for businesses.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Yvonne in Scotland

lenders.occupational_info: I do therapy work with all kinds of people, including victims of trauma.

lenders.name: John

lenders.occupational_info: I support a large university computer infrastructure. I enjoy every day and feel I make a difference...

lenders.occupational_info: Mr. FixIT

lenders.loan_because: I admire people who want to make the best of their chances

lenders.loan_because: I believe micro-credit is an innovative economic model for empowering small business owners.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people while letting them be independent.

lenders.name: Gerlinde
lenders.loan_because: this is better than donation!!!
lenders.occupational_info: interesting, but sometimes stressing

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: change and improvement begins with self.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to ensure people with developmental disabilities have timely access to quaility supports and services in their communities of choice.

lenders.name: Masha & Dor
lenders.loan_because: This is a beautiful way to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: it is inspiring

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of small loans on a person to person basis to women who have the courage to start their own business to make  a better life for themselves and support their  children to get an education. What I find attractive with the Kiva project is that this form of assistance is not charity. A small loan makes such good sense.  I wished this project was much more widely known amongst the more affluent of us who despair of our own governments and international organisations failing to tackle poverty and diseases.

lenders.name: Emergency Dept
lenders.occupational_info: We raise money in our coffee room selling soft drinks to staff members and distribute the money to various causes such as medecins sans frontiers, kiva and world vision.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: A small amount to us, makes a big difference to them.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: i wish to have a business, and am planning to run a general store.
lenders.occupational_info: i was once work as area in-charge in private company. I work hard, give 80% of my time for it, after 2 years of working i dont see any movement with my carrer, thats why i resigned. Now, im inviting everyone, to lend me for my starting capital.

lenders.name: Eugene
lenders.loan_because: I try to think globally and act locally.  The internet age has drastically reduced the size of our world such that "across the world" is now considered more local than in the past.
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate persons with head injuries, strokes, dementias by testing their memory, problem solving and lanugage skills.

lenders.name: Monyca
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to empower other people to improve their future for themselves and their community.

lenders.name: Bernhard
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: greghunt
lenders.loan_because: I realize that I'm extremely lucky to have a stable income with money to spare, and am happy to support entrepreneurs across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a civil engineer, working in the field of water resources.  I work mainly with dams, I study flooding, and inspect, repair, and remove old dams to restore the natural rivers and streams.  I also love photography, which you can see on my website.

lenders.name: LeWayne
lenders.loan_because: My kids made a loan to Kiva in my name as a birthday gift.  I have since reinvested.  As an independent business person I know how important it is to have resources to run a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I design interiors of residential and commercial buildings and play bass guitar and upright bass in my spare time.

lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people by affording credit to those who lack significant access.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a University.
